name: 烈山海前传之黑帝君临
name_original: 烈山海前传之黑帝君临
description:
《烈山海前传之黑帝君临》 is the prequel to the story series《烈山海》. The game tells the growth process of 楚鸿云, the protagonist of the series 《烈山海》. This game is a stand-alone role-playing game. The combat mechanism is turn-based.

story background
The player plays a boy who was originally indifferent to the world, and was suddenly destroyed overnight. As the only survivor in the family, he is determined to learn his skills to avenge his family. However, the road to learning is extremely difficult. On the way, players encounter all kinds of unexpected characters, including liars who fall into trouble, profiteers who take advantage of others, ministers who bully and oppress, generals who bully the weak, and deputies who are confused. , There are glamorous and charming babies, and ancient heroes. When dealing with these characters, players will face different choices of coping methods. They need to think correctly to choose the best way to get the ideal ending.

This game has a rich plot, and the entire plot text is about 1 million words. Players will be in the chaotic ancient times and become a teenager who wants to avenge his family. He has to fight monsters and upgrades as well as make plot choices, and experience the difficulties and joys of becoming the ruler of the world of mountains and seas or a happy fairy. There are more than a thousand branches. The plot is waiting for players to unlock, and ten completely different endings will make players feel emotional!
